import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Personne } from './classes/personne'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'L2DSI1'; name="Badi"; constructor(){ } Notes : number[] = [5, 8, 10, 15 , 20]; personnes: Array = [ new Personne(100, 'tounsi','Mohamed'), new Personne(101, 'tounsi2','Mohamed2'), new Personne(102, 'tounsi3','Mohamed3'), new Personne(103, 'tounsi4','Mohamed4') ]; getColor_pair():string{ return 'red'; } getColor_impair():string{ return 'blue'; } }
